thread.title: Lewis
thread.title_full: Players Choice Videogames reviewed by Lewis

author: Lewis
title: Lewis
text: the game came in such great condition and the the way it was like delivered was really great!!! y'all took the time to wrap in plastic wrap and stuff like its very proffesional. I'm really happy with my purchase from this site! ill probably buy more stuff later on but pls restock soon !!!
